text: Gentlemen of Fortune () is a 1971 Soviet comedy movie directed by Aleksandr Sery.Измены фортуны. Трагические повороты судеб создателей «Джентльменов удачи» It stars Yevgeny Leonov, Georgy Vitsin, and Savely Kramarov. == Actors == * Yevgeny Leonov as Yevgeny Ivanovich Troshkin / Aleksandr Aleksandrovich "Docent" Beliy *Georgy Vitsin as Gavrila Petrovich "Sad Sack" Sheremetyev * Savely Kramarov as Fyodor Petrovich "Crosseyes" Yermakov * Radner Muratov as Vasily Alibabayevich Alibaba * Erast Garin as Professor Nikolai Maltsev, archeologist == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1971 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Georgiy Daneliya
title: Gentlemen of Fortune
